title: Polynesian Cultural Center
seo_description: A day trip to the North Shore isn’t complete without a stop in the city of Laie, where the PCC stands on 12 acres of land that had been previously used to plant taro.
description: A day trip to the North Shore isn’t complete without a stop at the Polynesian Cultural Center in the city of Laie. Here you’ll learn about Polynesian cultures through food, activities, storytelling, and entertainment.
Price: $49.95 Adults; $39.96 Children (5-11 yrs); Tour and dinner show packages available
contents_1: A day trip to the North Shore isn’t complete without a stop in the city of Laie, where the PCC stands on 12 acres of land that had been previously used to plant taro.
